hooks.command: echo 'Reminder: use bun, not npm. Always run bun test before committing.'
osascript -e 'display notification "Claude Code needs your attention" with title "Claude Code"'

jq -r '[.tool_input.file_path, .cwd] | @tsv' | while IFS=$'\t' read -r file cwd; do if [[ "$file" == *.ts ]] || [[ "$file" == *.tsx ]]; then if [ -f "$cwd/biome.json" ] || [ -f "$cwd/biome.jsonc" ]; then bunx --bun biome check --write "$file" 2>&1; fi; fi; done

statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); dir_name=$(basename "$cwd"); git_info=""; if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then if ! git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks diff --quiet 2>/dev/null || ! git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null; then git_info=$(printf " \033[1;34mgit:(\033[31m%s\033[34m) \033[33m✗\033[0m" "$branch"); else git_info=$(printf " \033[1;34mgit:(\033[31m%s\033[34m)\033[0m" "$branch"); fi; fi; fi; model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name // empty'); model_badge=""; if [ -n "$model" ]; then model_badge=$(printf " \033[1;35m%s\033[0m" "$model"); fi; printf "\033[1;32m➜\033[0m  \033[1;36m%s\033[0m%s%s\n" "$dir_name" "$git_info" "$model_badge"; used=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.used_percentage // 0'); used_int=$(printf "%.0f" "$used"); if [ "$used_int" -ge 85 ]; then bar_color="\033[31m"; elif [ "$used_int" -ge 60 ]; then bar_color="\033[33m"; else bar_color="\033[32m"; fi; filled=$((used_int / 5)); empty=$((20 - filled)); bar=$(printf "%${filled}s" | tr ' ' '█'); rest=$(printf "%${empty}s" | tr ' ' '░'); printf "  ${bar_color}%s%s\033[0m \033[2m%s%%\033[0m" "$bar" "$rest" "$used_int"; dur_ms=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.cost.total_duration_ms // 0'); dur_int=$(printf "%.0f" "$dur_ms"); if [ "$dur_int" -gt 0 ]; then total_sec=$((dur_int / 1000)); hrs=$((total_sec / 3600)); mins=$(( (total_sec % 3600) / 60)); if [ "$hrs" -gt 0 ]; then dur_str=$(printf "%dh%dm" "$hrs" "$mins"); elif [ "$mins" -gt 0 ]; then dur_str=$(printf "%dm" "$mins"); else dur_str=$(printf "%ds" "$total_sec"); fi; printf " \033[2m⏱ %s\033[0m" "$dur_str"; fi
